title: The Loranth
description: But after archaeologist Christine Saynes disappears, Jules has a new assignment. Tasked with finding the missing scientist, Jules accidentally stumbles upon a previously undiscovered life form on the planet: The Loranth.  After he learns of a cruel plan being hatched on the planet, long-kept secrets awaken within Jules. He faces a difficult choice: either let his guilt swallow him whole, or step up and save all humankind.
author: Jean Kilczer
